EDITORIAL: After 25-year wait I can finally give blood again https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/editorial-after-25-年 - wait-i-can-i-can-finally-give-blood-blood-again/xpzjalbnlrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhnlfzom6jsijsijsijqim/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/editorial-after-25-年 - wait-i-can-i-can-finally-give-blood-blood-again/xpzjalbnlrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhrhnlfzom6jsijsijsijqim/ Mike DinsdaleNZ Blood Service taking blood again from those who lived in UK previously banned Wed, 05 Mar 2025 17:00:01 +0000 Northland Age editor Mike Dinsdale gave blood again this week, 25 years after his last donation in New Zealand, with a rule change now allowing those who had lived in the UK previously to give donate.
